data.title: great wings
data.text: this place has a good atmosphere.  the wings are really good.  cooked just perfectly.  music is usually a little too loud for my liking but overall, okay.

data.title: Poor Customer Service, They make the mistake ( and it was a big one ) and your the bad guy
data.text: We have eaten here a number of times, food is always hit or miss at best.  Given that it is just "bar" type food one shouldn't expect a lot to begin with as we didn't.  Not ever going back won't cause any hardships for us and have told all that will listen it is best to avoid this place. . A Good Attitude is everything and this place just has the "attitude". I am still in total disbelief that this business owner would make a huge mistake and then argue with the customer as if it was his fault. Avoid this place, spend your money elsewhere, who needs the bs. Pretty sure this business will become just another empty building on Broadway sometime soon.

data.title: Downtown Lorain eats
data.text: Got a special occasion?  Order wings here.  Great sauces and good pricing.  Have a beverage while you wait or eat them there and watch your favorite teams on their flat screens.  For holidays or big games, order a day ahead for pick up.

data.title: Good pub food and a nice bar
data.text: Good food- nothing high end but it's all quite good, and a well-stocked bar, lots of televisions to watch your favorite sports teams, and friendly people.

data.title: great palce for wings/burgers
data.text: Good bar and dining very casual and to watch a game on one of there many TV's located around. The owners and staff work like crazy to make your visit a great one. They open for lunch and close really late and are in a downtown that is on a comeback.

data.title: Too much of a bar for me
data.text: Typical bar food with wings and burgers but a little dingy and loud inside for my taste.  nice choice of sauces for their wings and reasonable prices.

data.title: Good local pub
data.text: Whille Scorchers is a chain, local brothers Wil and Dennis have done their best to keep Schorchers Lorain a great little neighborhood bar and grille.  Daily food and drink specials will entice you in and the friendly atmosphere will keep you coming back for more.
